mission_data.playerShipNames_arme: TSN Sabre\TSN Valiant\TSN Lancer\TSN Stalker\TSN Viper\TSN Horizon\TSN Necessity\TSN Hunter

set_ship_text.name: Tarnis Nebula Refinery
set_ship_text.desc: The finest refinery for natural gases in Triton. Stop by for helium, helium-3, xenon, vaporized tobacco, many more!

set_ship_text.name: Farosh
set_ship_text.desc: USFP civilian station operated by the Farosh family.

set_ship_text.name: Farosh Denabite
set_ship_text.desc: Denabite refinery operated by the Farosh family. Known system-wide for their highly refined products.

set_ship_text.name: Triton Refuge
set_ship_text.desc: Luxury refuge for wealthy USFP citizens looking to get away from everything. "Care about nothing but the distant glimmering stars." 3 habitation units available.

set_ship_text.name: Cassandra Observation
set_ship_text.desc: Observation and research post studying Schwarzschild phenomena on the rim of Cassandra. LOOKING FOR PhD/RESEARCH PROJECT? Contact us.

set_ship_text.name: Denabite Derby
set_ship_text.desc: USFP Denabite refinery, known system-wide for their unbeatable prices.

set_ship_text.name: DS-44
set_ship_text.desc: USFP Military deep space base overseeing traffic at Tethys Gate.

set_ship_text.name: DS-62
set_ship_text.desc: USFP military deep space base monitoring Charon Gate.
